name: accent chair
description: Combining a clean-lined design with the natural appeal of rubberwood in a reddish brown finish, this leisure chair creates a small summer oasis in your sunroom and fits well with decors from mid-century modern to country chic.

name: emperor bed
description: The most soft comfortable fitted sheet to help you sleep better and have a quite refreshing morning, a luxurious fitted sheet available for any room in your house - bedroom, guest, kids room, vacation home and also for hotel.

name: albany sectional
description: This modern sectional sofa features simple lines and square armrests atop tall tapered legs, giving it a minimalist feel that looks great with most decor styles.

name: arm chair
description: Get comfort you can literally sink into with this contemporary overstuffed accent chair. A clean and simple silhouette with track arms in a durable performance fabric, it's the perfect addition for your living room.
